alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 18 at 3:20AM EDT until April 18 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE LOWER MARYLAND EASTERN SHORE... The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a Red Flag Warning for the Lower Maryland Eastern Shore, which is in effect from noon today to 8 PM EDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 021 Dorchester, Fire Weather Zone 022 Wicomico, Fire Weather Zone 023 Somerset, Fire Weather Zone 024 Inland Worcester and Fire Weather Zone 025 Maryland Beaches. * TIMING...Noon to 8 PM Today. * WINDS...West 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...20 to 25 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 60s to lower 70s. * IMPACTS...The combination of dry conditions, low humidity, and strong gusty winds will result in favorable conditions for the rapid spread of fires this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico
